tanks.name: Main Reef Tank
tanks.description: Mixed reef with SPS and LPS corals. Running since January 2024.

notes.content: Initial setup complete. Cycling started with Dr. Tim's One and Only bacterial culture. Adding 2ppm ammonia daily.

First coral additions:
- Monitipora digitata (green)
- Acropora millepora (blue)
- Stylophora pistillata (pink)

All showing good polyp extension. Parameters stable.

Installed dosing system for:
- Calcium chloride
- Sodium bicarbonate
- Magnesium chloride

Dosing rates: Ca 50ml/day, Alk 45ml/day, Mg 30ml/day

livestock.notes: Pair of clowns. Very active, hosting in Duncan coral.
Beautiful blue coloration. Growing rapidly with good PAR.
Pink/purple tips. Very hardy SPS coral.
Setting up cleaning station near cave. Fish visiting regularly.

reminders.title: Weekly 10% Water Change
reminders.description: Change 25L of water (10% total volume). Clean powerheads during change.

reminders.title: Clean Protein Skimmer
reminders.description: Remove skimmer cup and clean thoroughly. Check air intake.

reminders.title: Test ICP Kit
reminders.description: Send water sample to Triton or ATI for ICP analysis.
